summary: This bill, the "Strengthening Cooperation and Security in the Middle East Act", mandates the Secretary of State, in consultation with the Secretary of Defense, to develop a report and strategy to increase membership in the Comprehensive Security Integration and Prosperity Agreement (CSIPA). The report, due within 180 days of enactment, will analyze CSIPA's benefits, its role in responding to regional threats, and factors affecting membership expansion. A subsequent strategy, also due within 180 days of the report, will focus on engaging countries to join CSIPA. Congress will also receive a briefing on the implementation plan.
